title: HackbotOne Django Application
description: HackbotOne platform is a blogging website. The idea behind this platform is to publish contents from Application Security & Software Development, which can be helpful for those who have an interest and passion in these areas.

title: HTTP Request Smuggling Detection Tool
description: The tool is written using python to detect CL.TE/TE.CL HRS vulnerability and the tool has built-in payloads which has around 37 permutes and detection payloads for both CL.TE and TE.CL

title: Python GraphQL Microservices
description: The proof of concept written using python and to implement the GraphQL it uses graphene python module and the microservices designed and implemented using flask framework and to store the data it uses mongodb database for the storage.

title: Python Kafka Messaging
description: The proof of concept written using python and it follows the core & common architecture of WhatsApp Messenger and to replicate the similar messaging concepts it uses kafka-python library to send/receive messages using KafkaProducer/KafkaConsumer. It also implements Twilio messaging framework for user authentication by verifying their registered phone no using the sent OTP and to cache all the user data and chat messages it uses mongodb database for the storage.

title: Python Flask Microservices
description: The Proof of Concept written using python and it uses a flask web framework to define the routes and to store the data in the server it uses mongodb database, and for authentication, it uses JWT Token framework.

title: My Portfolio | Full Stack MERN Application
description: A portfolio site is essential for every software developer to showcase projects and technical skills which demonstrates what you can do based upon your resume.

title: Forest Assassin 2D Platformer Game
description: Forest Assassin is a 2D adventure platformer game with easy controls and is developed with Unity3d game engine and is available for both Android & Web platforms.

title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) - Full Stack Application
description: The idea behind this application is to displays the statistics of Coronavirus (COVID-19) around the world and populate the statistics over the map.

title: HackbotOne - Full Stack Application
description: HackbotOne website produce contents from various domains such as Web Hacking, Bug Bounty, Application Development & GameDevelopment.

title: Virtual Reality Panorama viewer
description: The idea behind this project is to demonstrate how a user can able to see a panoramic image in virtual reality and the application was built using Unity3d panoramic SDK and build for Android devices.

title: Virtual Reality | Google VR SDK
description: The idea behind this project was to demonstrate how we can stream 360 videos using Google VR SDK and the proof of concept was developed using many Youtube 360 videos.

title: Twine
description: Twine is a payment based android application and the idea behind this application is to exchange money in between users, it supports Venmo payment gateway to transfer the money, this application is only available for the US market.

title: Fellow PRAP
description: This application was developed for the Kaivalya education foundation group and the application was specifically designed & developed for the fellow to appear their internal examination.

title: Fellow Register
description: This application was developed for the Kaivalya education foundation group and the application has some good features such as Planner, Notes, Calendar & Diary.

title: English to Odia Dictionary
description: It's an offline android dictionary by using this application a user can get the English meaning of an Odia word, this application has around 1 Million+ downloads in google play store.
